<languages/>
{{Special page}}
[[Image:Vector Sidebar.png|framed|{{dir|{{pagelang}}|left|right}}|<translate><!--T:1--> The default sidebar on the left, see the fifth link from top</translate>]]
<translate>
<!--T:13-->
'''Randomrootpage''' (<tvar name=1>[[Special:Randomrootpage]]</tvar>) allows the display of a random root page a wiki.
</translate>

<translate><!--T:14--> The regular random link generator (<tvar name=1>[[Special:Random]]</tvar>) is not suitable for some wikis or namespaces where utilising subpage hierarchies (such as Wikibooks).</translate>
<translate><!--T:2--> So this function can be used as a substitute.</translate>
<translate><!--T:12--> For example, it can be used to show "random books" in Wikibooks, instead of random pages.</translate>
<translate><!--T:15--> In a namespace where there are no subpages then the functionality is the same as <tvar name=1>[[Special:Randompage]]</tvar>.</translate>

<translate><!--T:16--> By default, selection will be limited to pages from namespaces in <tvar name=1><code>{{ll|Manual:$wgContentNamespaces|$wgContentNamespaces}}</code></tvar>.</translate>
<translate><!--T:3--> The user can choose which namespace to look in.</translate>
<translate><!--T:17--> For example, if they wanted to view a random file they could go to <tvar name=1>[[Special:Random/file]]</tvar>.</translate>
<translate><!--T:18--> If they wanted to view a random mainspace page they could go to <tvar name=1>[[Special:Random/main]]</tvar>, etc.</translate>

<translate>
===Usage=== <!--T:4-->
</translate>
<syntaxhighlight lang="html">[[Special:Randomrootpage]]
[[Special:Randomrootpage/{Namespace}]]</syntaxhighlight>

{| class=wikitable
! !! <code><nowiki>[[Special:Randomrootpage]]</nowiki></code> !! <code><nowiki>[[Special:Random]]</nowiki></code>
|-
| <translate><!--T:5--> content namespaces</translate>
| <translate><!--T:19--> Random rootpage on wiki</translate>
:[[Special:Randomrootpage]]
| <translate><!--T:20--> Random page on wiki</translate>
: [[Special:Random]]
|-
| <translate><!--T:6--> main namespace</translate>
| <translate><!--T:21--> Random rootpage on wiki</translate>
: [[Special:Randomrootpage/Main]]
| <translate><!--T:22--> Random page on wiki</translate>
: [[Special:Random/Main]]
|-
| <translate><!--T:7--> help namespace</translate>
| <translate><!--T:23--> Random rootpage in Help: namespace</translate>
: [[Special:Randomrootpage/Help]]
| <translate><!--T:24--> Random page in Help: namespace</translate>
: [[Special:Random/Help]]
|-
| <translate><!--T:8--> extension namespace</translate>
| <translate><!--T:25--> Random rootpage in Extension: namespace</translate>
: [[Special:Randomrootpage/Extension]]
| <translate><!--T:26--> Random page in Extension: namespace</translate>
: [[Special:Random/Extension]]
|}

<translate>
<!--T:9-->
There is currently no functionality that provides the random display of a subpage.
</translate>

<translate><!--T:27--> Some wikis utilise this in the configuration of their <tvar name=1>{{ll|sidebar}}</tvar>.</translate>
([[MediaWiki:Sidebar]])
